title: Login issue
description: User unable to log into the account with correct credentials.

title: Payment failed
description: Customer reported a payment failure while using a credit card.

title: Broken image on homepage
description: Main banner image does not load on Chrome browsers.

title: App crashes on startup
description: Mobile app crashes immediately after launch on iOS 17.

title: Email notifications not received
description: Customer is not getting any email notifications for updates.

title: Slow loading dashboard
description: Dashboard takes over 15 seconds to load on desktop.

title: Missing data in reports
description: Some reports are missing data for the last week.

title: Cannot reset password
description: Password reset email not being sent to user.

title: Incorrect billing amount
description: User was charged twice for the same invoice.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: User requested the ability to enable dark mode in settings.

title: System timeout error
description: Session expires too quickly when user is inactive for 2 minutes.

title: Bug in search functionality
description: Search returns incomplete or unrelated results.
